title: Wait, where am I?  Where did the old forums go?
body:
Welcome to the Help and Support Community, the next evolution of the forums!  Everything may seem different and confusing, but this is still the same place to get help, now new and improved!  

One you’re comfortable, here are a few things to keep in mind:

* ***Check if your issue already has a discussion about it:*** Upvoting this discussion and commenting in it will allow us and Wrenchmen to identify trending issues quicker.  
* ***The Wrenchmen are still here:***  The Wrenchmen are community volunteers that live in this community and take time to help Summoners with their issues. Look out for their orange name and Wrenchmen icon!
* ***Take advantage of the new and improved search feature:***  Let’s be honest, the search feature in vBulletin sucked.  The new Boards search feature is robust and will often find a discussion/solution to an issue you’re experiencing!
* ***Use the filters at the top of the page:***  You can custom set your view for this community by filtering discussions for Recent, Hot (recently upvoted), or Best (highest upvoted of all time).
* If you don’t like the nested comments you can switch to ***“Chronological View”*** to have it appear just like the old forums.  You can find this option in each discussion here:

http://i.imgur.com/hjEWSBD.jpg
